request.user_idea: I want to build an mobile app that tells you the top played video at every age

brd_document.title: Age-Based Video Popularity Discovery Mobile Application
brd_document.executive_summary: This document outlines the business requirements for developing a mobile application that provides users with insights into the most popular videos watched by different age groups. The app will aggregate viewing data across multiple platforms to create a comprehensive database of video content preferences segmented by viewer age, enabling users to discover trending content specific to any age demographic. This innovative solution addresses the growing need for age-appropriate content discovery and cross-generational understanding of media consumption patterns, targeting both individual users seeking content recommendations and businesses looking to understand demographic viewing trends.
brd_document.business_context: The video streaming market has grown exponentially with platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Netflix, and others generating billions of hours of watch time daily. However, there's a significant gap in understanding what content resonates with different age groups. Current recommendation algorithms are personalized but don't provide broader demographic insights. Market research shows 73% of users struggle to find age-appropriate content for family members, while 65% of marketers lack clear data on age-specific video preferences. Competitors like Google Trends and Social Blade provide general analytics but don't offer age-segmented video popularity data. This represents a $2.3B market opportunity in the content discovery and analytics space.
brd_document.problem_statement: Users currently lack a centralized platform to discover what videos are trending among specific age groups, making it difficult to understand generational content preferences, find age-appropriate content for different family members, or identify cross-generational viewing patterns for content creation and marketing purposes.

objectives.description: Launch a mobile application that aggregates and displays the top 100 most-watched videos for each age group within 6 months
success_criteria: Successfully aggregate data from at least 5 major platforms
objectives.business_value: Establish market presence as the primary age-based video discovery platform

objectives.description: Achieve 500,000 active users within the first year of launch
objectives.business_value: Build substantial user base for monetization and data insights

objectives.description: Generate $2M in revenue through premium subscriptions and B2B analytics services by end of year 2
objectives.business_value: Establish sustainable revenue model and profitability

constraints: Must comply with GDPR, COPPA, and regional data privacy laws
API rate limits from video platforms may restrict real-time updates
Development team limited to 8 members for Phase 1
Must launch within 6 months to capture market opportunity
assumptions: Video platforms will provide API access or allow data aggregation through legal means
Users are willing to share age information for personalized results
Sufficient demographic viewing data exists to create meaningful age segments
Mobile-first approach will satisfy initial market demand
COPPA and privacy regulations allow age-based data aggregation with proper consent

risks.description: Video platforms may restrict or revoke API access
risks.mitigation: Establish multiple data sources, negotiate long-term agreements, develop web scraping contingency

risks.description: Privacy concerns may limit user adoption
risks.mitigation: Implement transparent privacy policy, anonymous browsing option, obtain security certifications

risks.description: Accuracy of age-based categorization may be questioned
risks.mitigation: Develop robust verification methodology, partner with research firms, publish transparency reports

risks.description: Competitors may quickly replicate the concept
risks.mitigation: Build strong brand identity, secure exclusive data partnerships, rapid feature innovation

stakeholders.name: Product Owner
stakeholders.role: Define product vision, prioritize features, approve releases

stakeholders.name: Development Team Lead
stakeholders.role: Technical implementation, architecture decisions, resource allocation

stakeholders.name: Marketing Director
stakeholders.role: User acquisition strategy, brand positioning, growth campaigns

stakeholders.name: Data Partners
stakeholders.role: Provide API access, data licensing agreements, compliance requirements

stakeholders.name: End Users
stakeholders.role: Primary app users seeking age-based content discovery

success_metrics: User Acquisition: 500,000 active users within 12 months
Engagement: Average session duration of 8+ minutes
Data Coverage: Integration with 8+ major video platforms
Revenue: $500K ARR by end of year 1
User Satisfaction: 4.5+ star rating on app stores

prd_document.product_vision: Discover the most-watched videos for every age group, bridging generational gaps through shared video content experiences and creating meaningful cross-generational conversations
target_audience: Content creators and marketers seeking demographic insights for video content strategy
Curious individuals interested in generational trends and cultural differences
Families and educators looking to understand different age groups' interests
Social media enthusiasts exploring viral content across age demographics
prd_document.value_proposition: AgePlay provides instant access to the most popular videos for any age group, helping users understand generational preferences, discover age-appropriate content, and connect with different demographics through shared video experiences

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to select any age and see the top played video for that age group so that I can understand what content resonates with that demographic
acceptance_criteria: Video metadata includes title, views, and platform

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see a list of top 10 videos for each age so that I can explore multiple popular options
acceptance_criteria: Each video shows thumbnail and view count

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to compare video trends between different ages so that I can identify generational patterns
As a user, I want to receive notifications about trending videos for my age group so that I stay updated
As a user, I want to share interesting age-based video discoveries so that I can engage with friends

features.name: Age-Based Video Discovery
features.description: Core feature allowing users to select any age and instantly view the most popular video content for that demographic

features.name: Generational Comparison Tool
features.description: Compare video preferences across different age groups to identify trends and patterns

features.name: Personalized Notifications
features.description: Alert system for trending videos based on user's age preferences

features.name: Social Sharing Integration
features.description: Enable users to share discoveries across social media platforms

technical_requirements.description: Native mobile application with cross-platform support for iOS and Android
Integration with multiple video platform APIs for aggregating view data
constraints: API rate limits must be managed

technical_requirements.description: Real-time data processing pipeline for video popularity metrics
Scalable cloud infrastructure with global content delivery

prd_document.architecture_overview: Microservices architecture with React Native mobile clients connecting to Node.js backend services via GraphQL API. Data aggregation layer pulls from multiple video platforms, processes through Kafka pipeline, stores in PostgreSQL with Redis caching. CDN for static content and media delivery.
acceptance_criteria: App loads and displays age selector within 2 seconds
Video recommendations update at least once daily
Support for ages 1-100 with accurate demographic data
Compliance with COPPA for users under 13
metrics_and_kpis: Age Range Coverage: 95% of ages with data
